Package Model.Rules

Class ClassicRules

java.lang.Object
Model.Rules.UnoGameRules
Model.Rules.ClassicRules
public class ClassicRules extends UnoGameRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of the classic game mode of UNO
Classic deck composition of Uno
108 cards distributed so:
  • 4 Cards Wild
  • 4 Cards Wild Draw
  • Then for each color:
    • 1 Zero Card
    • 2 Cards for each value from 1 to 9
    • 2 Cards draw
    • 2 Cards skip
    • 2 Cards reverse
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

    • cardActionPerformance

      public ActionPerformResult cardActionPerformance(Options parameters)
